body_html:
I was just running into a similar issue running CUDA 7.5 with CuDNN 5.0 along with the newest drivers from Nvidia (Also Titan X, CentOS 7). I uninstalled all of that, installed CUDA 7.0 and let it install the prepackaged driver included, and CuDNN 2.0 and it fixed the issue for me.

Edit: CuDNN v2.0

body:
